pages.text:
======= Events Section =======
Event Venue in Orlando
Are you looking for an event venue to host your special event in Orlando, FL? Look no further than FUMA Lounge! Whether it's a birthday party, baby shower, engagement celebration, anniversary, or any other milestone event, our venue is the perfect setting for making lasting memories. Conveniently located in Orlando / Kissimmee, FL, FUMA Lounge offers a spacious, modern environment that can accommodate up to 250 guests.
Image on the left
Text on the right
PRIVATE EVENTS:
Birthday Parties: Celebrate your special day with friends and family in style.
Baby Showers: Host a beautiful baby shower with all the amenities you need to make it a memorable occasion.
Engagement Parties: Celebrate your engagement with loved ones in a chic, modern atmosphere.
Anniversaries: Whether it's your first or your 50th, celebrate your love story with a memorable anniversary event.
At FUMA Lounge, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and an unforgettable experience for every event. Let our professional team help you plan the perfect celebration. Contact us today to schedule a tour or to inquire about availability!
FUMA Lounge is the perfect event space in Orlando, FL. Celebrate life's special moments with us. Book your event today!
Image on the left
Text on the right
CORPORATE EVENTS:
Weâre equipped with everything you need to impress:
A professional sound system for crystal-clear audio.
A massive 150" screen for presentations, videos, or live feeds.
Dynamic pro lighting to set the perfect mood.
Comfortable seating that encourages conversation and connection
A private room available for executives, meetings, or any special use.
Looking for a unique venue for your next corporate gathering? Our space blends professional features with a relaxed, stylish atmosphere â perfect for casual team events, client mixers, product launches, or creative presentations.
Letâs make your next event anything but ordinary!

Text on the right

concert in Orlando, FL
, comedy show, album release party, or any event that deserves a great vibe and a professional setup? Our venue is built to bring your vision to life â whether it's a performance, a product launch or a fashion show.
Hereâs what we offer:

A massive 150" screen for visuals, videos, or live streaming
A private room for the artist
Capacity for up to 250 people
Ample free parking for all guests
Full support with event organization, security, and ticket sales
